title: Improving LLM Output by Combining RAG and Fine-Tuning
author: Haijie Wu; Junhwi Kim
description: When designing a domain-specific enterprise-grade conversational Q&A system to answer customer questions, Conviva found an either/or approach isn’t sufficient.
cntitle: 通过结合 RAG 和微调来改进 LLM 输出
cndescription: 在设计一个特定于领域的企业级会话式问答系统来回答客户问题时，Conviva 发现要么/要么的方法是不够的。
